The bill proposed by State Rep: Dean Kaufert aims to limit the use of food stamps for purchasing junk food.
Rep: Fred Clark expressed concern that the bill would also restrict the use of food stamps for organic foods.
The food stamps program: known as FoodShare in Wisconsin, is funded by federal funds and administered by the U.S. Department of Agriculture.
The bill would require FoodShare recipie: thirds of their benefits on a state-defined list of healthy foods.
